      • evalNode

        protected double[] evalNode(Factors pFactors,
                            Node pNode)
        This thing takes a node (usually the node from exec), and returns an array of the numerical values of each subnode.
        Parameters:
        pFactors - The factors that will be used when evaluating pNode.
        pNode - The node to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        An array of doubles, with each position corresponding to the value of each Node of that position in pNode's subNodes.

      • exec

        public double exec(Factors pFactors,
                   Node pNode)
            throws NotDefinedException,
                   InvalidArgsException
        this is kinda hacked together l0l
        Specified by:
        exec in class Function
        Parameters:
        pFactors - A factor class that contains all relevant information about variables / functions. This is where variable values and function definitions are stored.
        pNode - The Node that is going to be solved.
        Returns:
        A double representing the value of pNode, when solved for with pFactors.
        Throws:
        NotDefinedException - Thrown when the function is defined, but how to execute it isn't.
        InvalidArgsException - Thrown when the function required parameters, and the ones passed aren't right.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: Function
        Gets a String representation of the function. In reality, just returns its name, because a String repr of the code is wayyy too hard.
        Specified by:
        toString in class Function
